sentence.text: The aim of this study was to investigate the diagnostic sensitivity and specificity of protein induced by vitamin K absence or antagonist-II (PIVKAII), heparan sulfate proteoglycan catabolic process-3 (GP3), Cystatin B (negative regulation of peptidase activity), squamous cell carcinoma antigen 1 (SCCA1) and hepatocyte growth factor (HGF) as potential tumour markers for HCC in patients with alcoholic liver cirrhosis (biological_process) using imaging techniques (MSCT and MRI) as reference standards.
